item.title: First lab
item.description: Lecture Homework Hyper reality Mixed reality can improve a lot of tools, like google maps or, more generally, the way to present information. However, just as there are people who use technologies to do harm, mixed reality is also subject to abuse. The Hyper Reality video presents a dystopian vision of virtual reality and I will also present different problematic scenarios. Holo love As it is already the case with existing technologies, social networks tend to transform relationships into something virtual.
